article.Heading: Here are our tax experts' views on GST
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan and Bhupendra Chaubey, V Lakshmikumaran of Lakshmikumaran & Shridhar, Harishanker Subramaniam, National Leader of Indirect Tax at EY India, Rohan Shah, Tax Expert, MS Mani, Senior Director at Deloitte Haskins & Sells, Suresh Nandlal Rohira Partner at Grant Thornton India, Rajeev Dimri, Head of Indirect Tax at BMR Advisors and Pratik Jain, Partner at PwC India spoke about the launch and future of the goods and services tax (GST).
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan and Bhupendra Chaubey, V Lakshmikumaran of Lakshmikumaran & Shridhar, Harishanker Subramaniam, National Leader of Indirect Tax at EY India, Rohan Shah, Tax Expert, MS Mani, Senior Director at Deloitte Haskins & Sells, Suresh Nandlal Rohira Partner at Grant Thornton India, Rajeev Dimri, Head of Indirect Tax at BMR Advisors and Pratik Jain, Partner at PwC India spoke about the launch and future of the goods and services tax (GST).

Watch video for moreâ€¦
